titles.title: Welcoming His Majesty Shaikh Hamad bin Isa Al-Kalifa, King of the Kingdom of Bahrain, on his visit to the United States in February 2003.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

bill.summary: 2/5/2003--Introduced. Welcomes His Majesty King Hamad bin Isa Al-Khalifa of the Kingdom of Bahrain on his visit to the United States in February 2003.Commends Bahrain for its strong support of the U.S. Armed Forces and reiterates support for continued strong relations between the United States and Bahrain.
